com.github.ldeitos.validators

Class AbstractExtendedValidator<A extends Annotation,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.ldeitos.validators.AbstractExtendedValidator<A,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - Constraint annotation
    T - Type in validation.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.validation.ConstraintValidator<A,T>

    public abstract class AbstractExtendedValidator<A extends Annotation,T>
extends Object
implements javax.validation.ConstraintValidator<A,T>
    Abstraction to provide easy way to create validator with multiple violation registers.
    Since:
    0.8.0
    Author:
    Leandro Deitos

      • isValid

        public final boolean isValid(T value,
              javax.validation.ConstraintValidatorContext context)

        P.S.: Caution, don't override this method.
        Specified by:
        isValid in interface javax.validation.ConstraintValidator<A extends Annotation,T>

      • doValidation

        public abstract void doValidation(T value)
        Extension point to implement validation code.
        This code is invoked during API isValid(Object, ConstraintValidatorContext) call and violation must be registered by any methods below:
        • addViolation(String, String...)
        • addViolationWithDefaultTemplate(String...)
        Parameters:
        value - Value in validation.
        Since:
        0.8.0

      • addViolationWithDefaultTemplate

        protected void addViolationWithDefaultTemplate(String... msgParameters)
        Makes value on validation invalid and add a violation with default message template, defined in Constraint annotation, and parameters to interpolate.
        Parameters:
        msgParameters - Parameters to be interpolated in message violation.
        Can be informed in "value" pattern, to be interpolated in indexed parameter like "My {0} message" or in "key=value" pattern, to be interpolated in defined parameter like "My {par} message".
        Since:
        0.8.0

      • addViolation

        protected void addViolation(String msgTemplate,
                String... msgParameters)
        Makes value on validation invalid and add a violation with informed message template and parameters to interpolate.
        Parameters:
        msgTemplate - Message template can be:
        - Just message text, like "My message";
        - Message text with parameters, like "My {0} message" or "My {par} message";
        - Message key to get message in parameterized MessagesSource, like {my.message.key}.
        msgParameters - Parameters to be interpolated in message violation.
        Can be informed in "value" pattern, to be interpolated in indexed parameter like "My {0} message" or in "key=value" pattern, to be interpolated in defined parameter like "My {par} message".
        Since:
        0.8.0
